name: Get React
description:
Please welcome to the jetpack runner game made of pain and suffering and make your way up through the mystic cave full of deadly traps and shiny treasures.

Try your skills in amazing endless jetpack driven procedural generated runner challenge, where you will:
- Smash your face to the rock VERY FREAKING OFTEN!
- Play for unique characters and use their powerful special abilities;
- Improve your game experience and unlock game features by progressing through long upgrade tree (40+ items);
- Find valuable stuff and cool bonuses in old fashioned chests;
- Put your newbie friends to their place by beating their score;
- Enjoy beautiful pixel-art graphics and smash your face EVEN MORE meanwhile!
- And even break spider eggs and juggle other cool stuff!
